text: Nuko Nyagasani we amwakirira ubusabe neza, amukuzamu burere bwiza kandiagena ko arerwa naZakariya. Buri uko Zakariya yinjiragaaho (Mariyamu) yasengeraga, yamusanganaga amafunguro, akavuga ati "Yewe Mariyamu! Ibi ubikura he? Akavuga ati "Ibi bituruka kwa Allah". Mu byâ€™ukuri, Allah aha amafunguro uwo ashaka nta kubara
